item.description:
Have you ever wondered just how powerful you are when you consciously align your mind, body and spirit? The answers may amaze you after seeing this intriguing film The Great Lesson.

The Great Lesson (Running Time: 46 min.) is a new documentary film about the power of mind and body. 

This film features: A Martial art masters, tai chi and dance visionaries, a cell biologist, executive business coach, holistic psychotherapist, sports psychologist, Harvard professor and an inspiring self-healer who all join forces in one film to explain: "The Great Lesson"

Here is a sneak peak:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=csFTt5qdsA0

 

Please join us in viewing Drew Scott Pearlman's film "The Great Lesson" followed by guest speaker Drew himself.

Drew Scott Pearlman is a filmmaker and teacher who has spent the last 10 years living and making films in Massachusetts and Southern California. He's written and directed projects in all genres including documentary, action and animation. The Great Lesson is his most recent project and marks a new direction for the filmmaker. Drew sees The Great Lesson as the first in a series of films that inspires and shows people how powerful they really are. His next film The Healing Effect explores the healing and life changing power of food. In his own life, Drew draws inspiration from the speakers in his films as well as his young son. Drew also practices martial arts, yoga, meditation, play and following his bliss on a daily basis.
